SEARCH
Package org.opengrok.indexer.analysis

Class StreamSource

java.lang.Object
org.opengrok.indexer.analysis.StreamSource
public abstract class StreamSource extends Object
This class lets you create InputStreams that read data from a specific source. It could be used if you need to pass a stream as an argument to a method where the stream may need to be read multiple times. Instead of passing the stream directly, you pass a StreamSource instance that generates the stream. The receiver may call getStream() multiple times, getting a fresh stream each time, so that there may be multiple, concurrent readers that don't interfere with each other.

  • Method Details

    • getStream

      public abstract InputStream getStream() throws IOException
      Get a stream that reads data from the input source. Every call should return a new instance so that multiple readers can read from the source without interfering with each other.
      Returns:
      an InputStream
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs when opening the stream

      Helper method that creates a StreamSource instance that reads data from a file.
      Parameters:
      file - the data file
      Returns:
      a stream source that reads from file
